version_description: Increased performance and reliability.
Small bug fixes.
Small bug fixes
Small bug fixes.
Small bug fixes.

What’s new?

· You asked for it, you’ve got it -sign into your club using the new digital keytag

· Access your account information right from the app

· Link your favorite wearables and fitness apps to get all of your workout data in one place

· Snap a photo of your cardio machine workout, and the data will be logged for you

· … and more!
Miscellaneous improvements and fixes
Minor improvements and fixes
Minor improvements and fixes

Since you asked so nicely, we’re putting workout videos back where you want them. Just tap the new “Workout Videos” tile, and select your favorites. It’s like having your workout buddy with you wherever you go.

Welcome to the Planet Fitness app!

Check out our exciting NEW Planet Fitness Training Series featuring beginner and intermediate workouts, led by world-class trainers. Plus, you’ll have access to awesome features including workouts with Biggest Loser Trainer Erica Lugo, hundreds of exercise videos, and progress tracking for your fitness.

Welcome to the Planet Fitness app!

Check out the new Planet Fitness Membership section where you can view Club Check-In History and Membership Agreement information. We've also made some additional improvements and bug fixes.

What’s New
· Added the ability to change name from left side navigation
· Included Agreement info.
· Enhanced the left side navigation menu

What’s New
· Added the ability to view Agreement history
· Added Club Capacity meter for members with Open Clubs

What’s New
· Added Planet Fitness Welcome Packet
· Added In-App messaging
· Updated Profile menu

What’s New
· Updated Virtual Keytag experience
· Bug fixes

What's New
- PF+ The Planet Fitness Digital Membership
- Workouts Streamed LIVE Daily
- Digital workout classes you can do at home or at the gym!
- Experienced, easy to follow trainers
- Progressive series to keep you motivated!

What's New
-New homepage look!
-Enhanced LiveStream capability to access streams from prior days
-Enhanced Keytag screens
-Bug fixes

What's New:
- Enabled Upgrade availability
- Fixed BlackCard Guest Login issue
- Fixed navigational issue

What's New:
- Updated LiveStream Workout Schedule
- Updated Workout listings
- Fixed issues with user entry

What's New:
- We've combined the new PF+ Digital Experience offering with our Classic and Black Card Memberships
- Ability to Upgrade existing gym memberships into Memberships with the new PF+ Digital Experience
- A new Key Tag format for a quicker Club Check-In process
- Squashed a few bugs.

What's New:
- We've fixed an iPad issue was occurring

What's New:
- We've updated the Offer to included the new Amenities.

What's New:
- Added an InClub Join process
- Updated Keytag to use a QR Code

What’s New:

Updated Crowd Meter: See how many people are at your club before you go! Just tap the Crowd Meter at the top navigation to view how many members are at your club.

Healthkit Integration: Connect your Apple Healthkit in our workout tracker to keep track of all your workouts! Every minute matters so keep track of your workouts seamlessly in our App.

Apple Watch Keytag: On the go and no time to pull out your phone? No problem! Connect your Apple watch for an all new way to check-in at the club.

What’s New:
- New! Virtual Planet Fitness in-club tour. Join our very own Trainer Teddy as he guides you through the Planet Fitness in-club experience. We’ll start with welcoming you with touchless check-in, then he’ll take you through each section of the club and explain the benefits and why your fitness is essential so you can get the most out of your fitness journey! Find this tour video on the homepage, main nav menu, or our free workouts video section.
- Updated refer a friend process, now available for Planet Fitness in-club members only. Users need to link their membership or sign up for in-club membership to utilize this feature.
- Updated Error Messaging

Whats New:
- Fix issue with entering profile data
We are making the in-club app experience even better to easily download the app and join Planet Fitness. Get an in-club gym membership with just one scan of a QR code.

What's New
- Bug fixes to improve overall experience

What's New
- To fix a specific issue with wearables connection

What’s New
- Bug fixes to improve the overall experience to the gym in your pocket
Workout Filtering: Now with the ability to quickly and easily filter or search for your ideal workout!

What's new:
- squashed a few bugs

What’s New:
We always got your back with improving our app usability.
We now have an updated activity tracker featuring quick adds so you can stay focused on your fitness journey and updated page designs. Check it out!

What's new:
Check out Workout Filtering, with the ability to quickly and easily filter or search for your ideal workout!

What's New
- Squashed a few bugs

What's New
- Fixed an issue and added a feature enhancements

- a quick bug fix

What's new:
- fixed an issue with Club Tour link

We've updated our Planet Fitness Perks section!

Get alerted of new offers that are launched and keep tabs on the countdown for our exclusive limited time offers. It is now easier than ever to experience our wide variety of membership perks. Start exploring tons of discounts and offers that are included with your membership today.
